version_description:
- Too many ads issue fixed. We've fixed a problem which was causing too many ads to be displayed. Apologies for the inconvenience caused.
- Based on many requests - Any In App Purchase now removes ads permanently.
- Fixed a problem where dashing and sliding too much in the tutorial caused issues.
- Fixed a Facebook profile image crash which was occurring for some players.
- Fixed a problem on the garden level that stopped you from sliding through a bush.

- NEW CAT 'Toffers' - The richest cat on the block. Toffers dines from a gold plated cat dish and refuses to eat anything but caviar.
- Stuck on a Mission?? Skip missions from the mission screens.
- 3 New PRESENTS available. Increase your chances of Cat Coins & Trails. Unlock more Cats & Trails!
- What LEVEL are you?? See a handy reminder of your Score Multiplier Level in the top right corner of menu screens.
- Get to know everyone! Every CAT now has an a-meow-zingly funny Biography
- We've fixed a bad bug causing older iOS versions to crash. Sorry if you were one of many older generation iPad users having this issue! PLEASE GIVE US ANOTHER CHANCE!

- Big update this month - play our brand new Cat Garden feature. A place for you to show off your cat collection and win rewards. Fill each page to see a special animation.
- 3 New Exclusive Cats - Meet Violet, Trashy, Crumbs & our special Easter buddy Chuck
- We've added support for French, Italian, German, Spanish & Portugese (Brazilian). Tap the flag in the settings menu to select a new language.
- Simon's Cat Dash is now fully optimised for iPhone X.
- We'll now be offering Daily Cat Deals which are a great opportunity to get your favourite cat. Just tap the shop button on the home screen to see what deal is on today!

- THREE NEW CATS have been added to game - Many MORE CATS coming soon!!
- We've been doing nine lives worth of work under the hood, in order to put as many cats in the game as possible.
- Added a tip to show the advantages of Facebook login - SPOILER ALERT - logging in saves your data across installs and devices. YAY!!
- GET A REWARD in game for liking our Simon's Cat Dash Facebook page. LIKE US to keep up to date with all our latest news and offers. COMPETITIONS with prizes are coming soon!!
- We have done some minor updates to improve the game!

- Da! Simon’s Cat Dash is now available to play in Russian
- You can now take both a Trail and Buddy on a run at the same time
- We’ve purrfected the animations and special effects in the Cat Garden
- You can now take your score even higher with more upgrade levels

- There are 3 new brand new cat gardens waiting for you to fill up with your furry friends. You can now unlock the Modern, Strawfields and Autumn Garden.
- We’ve added 6 fantastic felines. You can now unlock Boots, Caramel, Nikita, Misty, Patches and Steve.
- We’ve got a brand new promotional system available to help you unlock your favourite cats and buddies.

- There are 3 new brand new cat gardens waiting for you to fill up with your furry friends. You can now unlock the Modern, Strawfields and Autumn Garden.
- We’ve added 6 fantastic felines. You can now unlock Boots, Caramel, Nikita, Misty, Patches and Steve.
- We’ve got a brand new promotional system available to help you unlock your favourite cats and buddies.

- There are 3 new brand new cat gardens waiting for you to fill up with your furry friends. You can now unlock the Modern, Strawfields and Autumn Garden.
- We’ve added 6 fantastic felines. You can now unlock Boots, Caramel, Nikita, Misty, Patches and Steve.
- We’ve got a brand new promotional system available to help you unlock your favourite cats and buddies.

- We’ve got paw-some new stickers for you to enjoy.
- We’ve got a brand-new cat garden for you! Dotty's Garden is now available to place your feline friends in.

- We have a brand-new cat garden! Your cats can now chill out in at the Allotment.
- There are some very cute new cats for you to collect! Say hello to Jet, Lufa, Daisy, Socks and Millie.
- You can combine your new cats with over 40 new trails!

- Halloween has come to Simon’s Cat Dash
- Our spooky new feline friend, Boo, is now available
- There’s a brand new Daily Quest Garden Path – Complete the daily quests to receive paw-some rewards

- Halloween has come to Simon’s Cat Dash
- Our spooky new feline friend, Boo, is now available
- There’s a brand new Daily Quest Garden Path – Complete the daily quests to receive paw-some rewards
- We’ve added great new weekend events to give you opportunities to collect even more butterflies and even higher scores
We have done some minor updates to improve the game!
We have done some minor updates to improve the game!
